full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,TSE SGRUB ZHAG BDUN MA'I NYAMS LEN GYI RIM PA 'CHI MED BDUD RTZI'I BCUD LEN BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,'PHAGS YUL GRUB DBANG PADMA'I DANG TSUL TSUL GANG, ,GANGS CAN 'DI NA RONG STON CHOS KYI RJE, ,RJE BTZUN DAM PA'I THUGS BCUD BDUD RTZI'I RGYUN, ,RGYUN CHAD MED PAR BLA MA'I DRIN LAS THOB, ,GANG NGE RIS MED BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG CHE, ,NOR 'DZIN SKYONG BA NGAG DBANG MTSAN CAN GYI, ,RGYUN GYI NYAMS BZHES TSUL DU BKOD PA PO, ,SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO GSAL MING CAN NO, ,DGE'O, ,)
